original_text: The Spirit of the Lord came powerfully upon him so that he tore the lion apart with his bare hands as he might have torn a young goat. But he told neither his father nor his mother what he had done.
korean_text: 여호와의 영이 삼손에게 강하게 임하니 그가 손에 아무것도 없이 그 사자를 염소 새끼를 찢는 것 같이 찢었으나 그는 자기가 행한 일을 부모에게 알리지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: The Spirit of the Lord came powerfully upon him
so that he tore the lion apart with his bare hands
as he might have torn a young goat
But he told neither his father nor his mother
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 아버지에게도 어머니에게도 말하지 않았으니
